entry.title: An Introduction to Sentiment Analysis of Textual Data
entry.summary:
Description

In this tutorial, youâ€™ll be introduced to Sentiment Analysis (SA), the extraction of subjective, affective information from text through Natural Language Processing (NLP) to enable data-driven decisions. Participants will work through a step-by-step application of SA to build a sound knowledge of its different components and an understanding of this powerful technique in various business settings

entry.title: Learn how to Make Life Easier with Anaconda
entry.summary:
Description

PyData DC 2016

Bring your laptop & get started with Anaconda, the leading platform for Open Data Science powered by Python. You'll get hands-on experience using conda & Anaconda Cloud to share notebooks, packages, codes, & environments and to get stuff done. No software pre-installation required (although installing Anaconda beforehand may be helpful).
